text: Limonium sundingii is a species of flowers that belong to the family Plumbaginaceae. The species is endemic to Cape Verde.Oromí, Martín, Zurita & Cabrera, 2005 : Lista preliminar de especies silvestres de Cabo Verde: Hongos, Plantas y Animales Terrestres. Gobierno de Canarias, Consejería de Medio Ambiente y Ordenación Territorial, p. 49 It is listed as critically endangered by the IUCN. ==Distribution and ecology== Limonium sundingii is restricted to the island of São Nicolau, where it occurs in a small area in the east of the island, between 600 and 700 m elevation. They are found in humid and sub-humid zones. ==References== sundingii Category:Flora of São Nicolau, Cape Verde Category:Endemic flora of Cape Verde
title: Limonium sundingii
